attributes.action: British high-tech expertise to remain within National Borders.
attributes.additional_details:
Rolls-Royce and Bentley cars sold to Germany 1998
Decca Radar sold to USA 2000.
Decca Navigator sold to France 2000
British Leyland broken-up and bits sold to China, India and Germany during period 1976 - 2005
Thames Water to Germany 2001
Powergen 2002 to Germany
BAA sold to Spain 2006
P&O to Dubai 2006
ICI sold to Holland 2008
Branston Pickles to Japan 2016
Imminent 2016: 
ARM Holdings to Japan
LSE to Germany . . .

. . . alas, et al ad infinitum!

(All these and many more not mentioned may be reference via Wikipedia: https://www.wikipedia.org/)
attributes.background: Selling to the highest overseas bidder benefits them, not us. Loss of Strategic and financial benefits undermines National pride and security and deprives British Government of Tax revenues.
